mapper.select: SELECT CB.NO ,CB.ADMIN_NO ,CB.MEMBER_NO ,CB.ENROLL_DATE ,CB.CONFIRM_DATE ,CB.UNIQUE_NUM ,CB.IMG ,CB.NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM CAR C UNION SELECT * FROM BICYCLE B ) CB WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${no}

SELECT CB.NO ,CB.ADMIN_NO ,CB.MEMBER_NO ,CB.ENROLL_DATE ,CB.CONFIRM_DATE ,CB.UNIQUE_NUM ,CB.IMG ,CB.NAME ,M.NAME ,M.PHONE ,A.NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM CAR C UNION SELECT * FROM BICYCLE B ) CB JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.NO = CB.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN ADMIN A ON(A.NO = CB.ADMIN_NO)
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAR) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BICYCLE) AS total_count FROM DUAL
